description: Our deluxe rooms are perfect for couples or solo travelers who want a little extra comfort and luxury. This room comes with a king-sized bed and all the essential amenities for a relaxing stay.

Our standard rooms are perfect for couples or solo travelers who need a comfortable and affordable place to stay. This room comes with a queen-sized bed and all the essential amenities for a comfortable stay.

Our deluxe rooms are perfect for families or groups who want a little extra space and luxury. This room comes with a king-sized bed and a comfortable sofa bed, making it ideal for up to four guests. You'll also enjoy all the amenities you need for a relaxing stay.

Our luxurious suites are perfect for couples looking for a romantic getaway or anyone who wants to indulge in some extra comfort and relaxation. This room comes with a spacious king-sized bed and a private Jacuzzi, as well as all the amenities you need for a truly memorable stay.
